name: send_team_update
description: Send updates to the #dream-team-ops Slack channel. Use this to communicate task progress, agent thoughts, or important notifications to the engineering team. Messages for the same task_id will be automatically threaded together.

message.description: The main message content to send to Slack

event_type.description: Type of update - determines emoji and formatting. Default: 'info'

task_id.description: Optional task UUID - if provided, updates will be threaded under the original task message

details.description: Optional additional details to include in a code block (will be truncated if too long)
